utterance.speaker: KATE BECKETT
utterance.content: This is heaven. This is absolute heaven.

utterance.speaker: RICHARD CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, you mean spending the day with your future husband?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, no. Not that.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Not that?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, no, no. I mean, not only that. It’s 2 o’clock. I’m in my PJs. We’re reading the newspaper. I never get to do this.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Because you never take any time off.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: All we have to do is loaf about. There’s no work. No goals other than to waste hours on end.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, stop describing my life. So there is one thing we should get done today. We need to pick a font for our save the date cards.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Really? We’re going to do that? We don’t even have a venue yet.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, I find deadlines … inspiring. How about this one?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, it’s too frilly.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Agreed. Ooh … this is far too severe. You will save the date now.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh, I like that one. You?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Uh … I’m not really felling it … but I guess you could convince me.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I bet I could.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah. I mean, you’d have to work pretty hard to win me over, but …

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, I’m prepared to do just that. Because it’s clear what we both need right now is a really … good … font.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes we do. That’s so true.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh … and worst timing ever.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Beckett.

utterance.speaker: CAPTAIN VICTORIA GATES
utterance.content: Detective. How soon can you get here?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Uh, sir, I’m actually not on call today.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: I’m aware of that. But something has come up and I’m afraid it can’t wait.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, I can get there in 20 minutes.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: One more thing. Come alone. Do not bring Mr. Castle.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Uh … yes, sir.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So what’s Gates up to, aside from sabotaging out domestic bliss?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t know. But I gotta go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Huh. I don’t suppose I could convince you to just –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Don’t worry. It’s fine. Don’t worry about it. I’m fine. I’ll just, uh … I’ll do some writing. If I can manage to focus.

utterance.speaker: JAVIER ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yo, Beckett. I thought you were off.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Was that the Deputy Commissioner?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah. There’s been more brass through here than a marching band.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: KEVIN RYAN
utterance.content: It’s all need to know and we didn’t make the list.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well, whatever’s going down is happening in that conference room.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Detective.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Beckett.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Sorry.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Detective Beckett, Captain Fowler, head of narcotics.

utterance.speaker: CAPTAIN FOWLER
utterance.content: Thank you for coming, Detective. What I’m about to tell you cannot leave this room.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, understood, sir.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: These six victims had their throats cut. They were mid to upper lever drug dealers. Two were teenagers. They were all murdered in the past few months when a new drug ring muscled in and took over most of the uptown heroin and cocaine trade.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: A new drug ring? Who are they?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: The Commissioner asked me to find that out and shut them down. But they’re invisible, these guys. They don’t use banks, so we can’t follow the money. They make sure their street dealers never meet their suppliers.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So when you bust a deal he doesn’t know who he’s working for.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Exactly. So three months in and we have nothing. We don’t even know any of their names. Except for Lazarus.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And who is Lazarus?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: The leader. Not his real name, of course. The yesterday, a phone intercept lead us to this woman. Elena Markov. She copped to being a low level drug courier in their ring. Born in Russia she came here as a mail order bride, divorced her husband. She learned to speak English better than we do and was getting by as a freelance translator. She’d never been in trouble before. At least until now.

utterance.speaker: ELENA MARKOV
utterance.content: I needed work and I heard about a way to make money. All I had to do was call a number, so I did. Once I got in I couldn’t get out.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Who was your contact in the ring?

utterance.speaker: ELENA
utterance.content: I didn’t have one. I would get a text with a time and a place and I’d get a package with a note hidden inside that would tell me where to take it.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Did you ever see anyone? Did you ever interact with anyone?

utterance.speaker: ELENA
utterance.content: Everything was anonymous. I don’t know them. They don’t know me. It needs to stay that way. Look, I – I just want to get my life back.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: It looked like another dead end. Then this morning Elena got another text from the ring. This time they wanted to meet her to offer her a promotion.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Which would give you guys a chance to get eyes on someone.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: It’s the break we’ve been waiting for. So we leveraged Elena to take the meet. But she tried to commit suicide.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: She’s in intensive care under police guard.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Sir, I’m sorry to hear about that, but what does this all have to do with me?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: The meeting is set for 5 today and a chance like this is not going to come back around. So we combed the NYPD database for someone about Elena’s age and appearance who speaks fluent Russian in case that’s relevant. Only one name came up.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Yours.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You want me to go in her place?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: To the Widmark. Show up, meet your contact, and leave. In and out.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What if they found out that you turned Elena and this is all a trap?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Then they wouldn’t be meeting at the Wydmark Hotel. We were very careful. No one knows she’s made contact with us.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Still there’s a risk that they could see Detective Beckett and realize that she’s not Elena.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: In the text they asked Elena to wear a red scarf, which tells us that they don’t know her on sight. My people will be in place watching every move you make. We can even fit you with a monitored mic if you like.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Detective, something big is going on out there. And this is our best chance to find out what. But the meeting is in two hours. So I need your answer.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Castle.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wow, you sound like you are getting a lot of writing done.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I blame you for that. When are you coming back?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Uh … I don’t know. A couple of hours? I have a meeting. And don’t ask me what it is.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Whoa. Now I have to ask.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Look, I – I have to get going. I should be back in time for dinner. Maybe we can have a glass of wine together.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I will decant something amazing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay. I love you. ‘bye.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: I have to tell you, I don’t care for Captain Fowler’s hard-sell tactics. This is a narcotics operation. You don’t have to do this. You can walk away and I’ll take the heat.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you, sir, but I – I can handle this.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Then they’re ready to review the plan and give you a final briefing.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Remember, don’t move like a cop. You’re Elena. You’re intimidated by these guys. They’ve been leveraging you for two months.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: There will be five plainclothes officers in the lobby and more throughout the hotel. Head to the north elevator and go to the eleventh floor. The meet is in room 1123. Undercover officers up there will have your back. Stay calm. Memorize names and faces of whomever you meet and you’ll be out in no time.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Which floor?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Eleven.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Don’t move a muscle.

utterance.speaker: PLAINCLOTHES OFFICER
utterance.content: Elevator just got to eleven.

utterance.speaker: PLAINCLOTHES OFFICER
utterance.content: It’s empty. She’s not here. She is not here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: This is Detective Kate Beckett. If you can hear me, I’ve been abducted. I’m in a white cube van, New York plates. We’ve been traveling about … twenty minutes. We’ve been making a lot of turns, but I think we’re headed east. Captain Fowler, if you can hear me, this is seriously ruining my dinner plans.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: You promised me that you had her back. What happened?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: We were set up for a simple meet, not an orchestrated kidnapping.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: The security cameras. Did they get a shot of who did this?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: They were disabled momentarily throughout the hotel.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: What about the mic Beckett had on?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: We stopped receiving audio after she got into the elevator. The signal strength drops in enclosed spaces.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: And let me guess. Whoever was in room 1123 didn’t know about a meeting because there never was going to be one.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Look, we’ve issued a limited alert.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: A limited alert? We need to call in the cavalry here.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: We know the drug ring tracks police radios. Sending up a flare could make things worse.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: They must have known that your girl rolled on them. Or they made Beckett. Either way she’s dead if we don’t find her immediately.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Gentlemen, we have a situation.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We’ve been driving for about an hour now, maybe more. Uh … two lane road , not a lot of traffic. We’re slowing down. We stopped. I’ve got to get rid of this thing.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Get on your knees and face the wall toward the cab. Do not move.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Don’t turn around.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Time to see if you’re wearing a wire.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m not wearing a wire.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: We’ll see about that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: This is Detective Kate Beckett. I’m unavailable at the moment, but please leave a message.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA RODGERS
utterance.content: Well, I know you have plans with Katherine this evening, so I’m going to make myself scarce. Oh, very nice. I’m off to a revival of Brighton Beach Memoirs. Pray for me. What’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I – I can’t get ahold of Beckett. I texted her, I left messages. This is not like her.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Maybe she got tied up at the precinct. Have you tried Ryan or Esposito?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, I called them both. It just goes straight to voicemail. Just … something is not right.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So what happens now?

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: It’s not my call.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Is that who we’re waiting for? Whoever’s in that room?

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: You sound worried.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Should I be?

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: What the hell makes you so special?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m not special. I don’t know anything. I just move packages. I’m not a threat to anyone.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: You can drop the act.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Let’s go. You’re up.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: It is important for me to know if you are a friend.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I am a friend. A true friend.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: You are Elena Markov?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: It’s good to finally meet you. You can call me Mr. Jones and this is Mr. Harden.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: I’m sorry for the lengths we go to to have a meeting, but these are the times we live in. Can I get you anything? A drink?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: Huh. To business, then? You should know how much we value your services. Lazarus in particular.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well I do the best I can.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: But always as a freelancer. What we want to do is offer you a permanent position with our organization.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: That’s per week, of course. How does that strike you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s very generous. But I’m going to need to meet Lazarus.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: That’s not an option.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I need to know who I’m doing business with. It’s a matter of trust.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: All right. I’ll pass along the request, but you’ll remain our guest here until I get an answer. Please, see Ms. Markov to her bedroom.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Sir, can I have a word, please?

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: Sure. Would you excuse me, please?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: What’s the problem?

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: She’s the problem. She’s all wrong.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: I’ve been watching her. She acted like she didn’t know why she was here.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Esposito.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Javi. Javi, it’s me.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Beckett, where are you? We’ve got half the force looking for you. Hey!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey, listen. Get a trace on this phone. Get eyes on me. I don’t know where I am or who the hell Elena Markov is, but her story is a lie. She is more than just a low level courier.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: You never like it when we bring new people in. Especially above you.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: That’s not what it is, not this time. Okay? She was afraid.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: All right. You keep an eye on her and if she is wrong then you get to do the honors, okay?

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Let’s go.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Are you telling me we can’t trace Beckett’s call?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It’s a voiceover internet line fed through an anonymizer.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Okay, but can we at least narrow it down to the area where the call was made?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: No. It was routed through Ukraine and bounced all over Europe. These guys know security.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Captain, why did Beckett tell us that Elena Markov was more than just a courier?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: I have no idea.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: So there’s nothing about her that you haven’t told us.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Absolutely not. Every part of her story checked out. But –

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: But what?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: We didn’t have enough time to go deep. Not with things moving this fast. We didn’t even know Ms. Markov until yesterday.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Well maybe you didn’t know her at all.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I think we can fix that. The hospital just called. She’s conscious.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Go talk to her. Get to the bottom of this.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: I’ll go with you. She knows me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey. You guys have not been returning my calls. Where’s Beckett?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Mr. Castle. Why don’t you come into my office?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Do we have any idea where she is?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Traffic cam footage caught a white van heading away from the Wydmark right when she was abducted. We think she was in it and we’re trying to track it down. There are reasons for hope here.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’d love to hear them.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: First of all, they didn’t make her as a cop. They think she’s Elena Markov, which buys us time.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She’s pretending to be Elena when she doesn’t know who Elena is? She can’t keep that up forever.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Well hopefully she won’t have to. Once Elena tells us everything that she knows about this it could lead us to Beckett.

utterance.speaker: DOCTOR BAILEY
utterance.content: Ms. Markov regained consciousness about an hour ago. She’s stable so we transferred her out of ICU.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Has she said anything yet?

utterance.speaker: DOCTOR BAILEY
utterance.content: Just that she’s glad to be alive.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: So she’s lucid?

utterance.speaker: DOCTOR BAILEY
utterance.content: Yes, but she’s also extremely weak from her ordeal, so please, I’d ask that you limit your time with her as much as possible.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We need answers so we’re going to question her as long as it takes.

utterance.speaker: DOCTOR BAILEY
utterance.content: Room’s just up here. 3410.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I thought you had an officer guarding her?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: We do. He must be inside with her.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Elena Markov, NYPD –

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Son of a b*tch.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We have an officer down! Officer down!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Elena’s gone.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Either she killed him and fled –

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Or someone else did and they grabbed her. If they took Elena that means Beckett’s cover is blown. She’s a good as dead.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Dear Rick, I don’t know how much time I have, even to write this letter. What I do know now is that I’m in this and the only way I’m going to make it out alive is to see this through. I’m sure everyone is looking for me and if they figure out I was here CSU is going to search this house. They’re going to look for blood and they will find it, which will lead them to this letter.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Mr. Jones wants a word.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: I’ve got surprising news. Lazarus agreed to meet with you … - if you agree to an assignment.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What assignment?

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: You complete the assignment, you get the meeting. Take it or leave it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Deal. What do I have to do.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: What you do best. Kill him.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: And make it clean.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: We’re here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where’s here?

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: All you need to know is that your target’s in that house.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Is he alone?

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: As far as I know. Use this. Lazarus doesn’t want it to be connected to your other kills.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well he’s got to be important. Who is he?

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: He’s the next name on the list.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What does he do?

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Why are you so curious all of a sudden?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Have you ever heard of recon? I like to know what I’m walking into. Is he a cop? Is he a drug dealer? Are there guns in the house? Curiosity keeps me alive.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: The guy’s a civilian. A nobody.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: If he’s a nobody then why are we killing him?

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Because they told us to.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Look, is there a problem?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, there’s a problem. I don’t work like this. I do my homework, I control the variables. And this is sloppy.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: You know, maybe Lazarus wanted to see how well you improvise. You know, maybe I do, too. Now … are you going to kill him or what?

utterance.speaker: EVAN POTTER
utterance.content: Who in the hell are you to –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s done.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Show me.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What? No, we don’t have time for this.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: I said, show me. Now.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Like I said.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m done auditioning. You tell Lazarus he wants to play games and this deal is off.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Yeah, we should get back.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Just got off with hospital security again. Building’s locked down. We’ve got teams going through but there’s no sign of Elena.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We still have no idea who this woman really is.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: I’m afraid we do. Security video shows her leaving her room alone and the officer’s throat was cut in the same exact manner as the murdered drug dealers. Same angle, same left handed stroke, favoring the carotid.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: That’s what those text messages meant about packages being delivered. She wasn’t a courier for the ring.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: She was their contract killer.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: A contract killer? That’s who Beckett is out there impersonating and you didn’t know?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Mr. Castle –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And now this woman is out there somewhere? Do you have any idea what’s going to happen to Beckett when the real Elena shows up?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: We’re doing everything we can.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well it’s not enough!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hey. Come on, man.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: This is Gates. What? Where?

utterance.speaker: POTTER
utterance.content: She told me to get on the floor. And then she said she was a cop and that if I wanted to live I had to do exactly what she said. And then she went to the kitchen and she came back with ketchup and – and beet juice and – and she told me to lie as still as possible and hold my breath.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Mr. Potter, did she say anything else about where she was, where they were keeping her?

utterance.speaker: POTTER
utterance.content: Yeah, she said it was some kind of a compound. She didn’t know where, but that she would try to get a message out soon.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: At least we know she’s still alive.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: This guy that was with her, did you see his face?

utterance.speaker: POTTER
utterance.content: No, I had my head down.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Do you have any idea why members of a drug ring would want you dead?

utterance.speaker: POTTER
utterance.content: No, that’s not my world.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: You’re an attorney at Tyre, Potter, and Langston. What kind of law do you practice?

utterance.speaker: POTTER
utterance.content: Mostly corporate. Trust administration.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Do you do any criminal law?

utterance.speaker: POTTER
utterance.content: No. None.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I hate this. She’s out there somewhere, has no idea how much danger she’s in, and I can’t help her.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: No. You can’t. But this is Beckett we’re talking about. She might be your fiancée but she’s also a damn good cop, so don’t sell her short. She’ll figure out a way to let us know what’s going on. And when she does, we’ll get her out.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What if it’s not in time?

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: So, how did it go?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The package was delivered without any issues.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: Good. Clean yourself up. Lazarus wants to see you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re getting out of here alive.

utterance.speaker: TESSA
utterance.content: Oh, sorry! I really have to pee. Do you mind?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, it’s fine!

utterance.speaker: TESSA
utterance.content: Great gig, huh?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, it’s amazing.

utterance.speaker: TESSA
utterance.content: I don’t know who these guys are, but they sure do like to spend money.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: Come on. He’s waiting.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: This way.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You keep him in the basement?

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: He likes it there. He thinks it suits him. After you.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: What’s the matter? You’ve never seen a counting room before?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes. But never to this scale.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: Lazarus is a man of enormous appetites.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m impressed you’ve been able to hide this from the Feds.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: You don’t know the half of it.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: Wait here.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: He’s ready. Come in.

utterance.speaker: VULCAN SIMMONS
utterance.content: I apologize the delay. I had to resolve a business matter.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Of course.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: I don’t usually do this, meet like this. But for you I’ll make an exception. Between our needs and your skillset this could be a very profitable arrangement.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I agree.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: Good. So, now that we’ve met, why don’t we formalize our arrangement?

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: You’re not Elena.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: I know you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. No, I don’t think you do.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: No, no, no. I never forget a face. Detective Beckett.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: No. No, no, no.

utterance.speaker: JONES
utterance.content: She’s a cop?

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: Homicide. Out of the Twelfth. Last time I saw you you tried to put me through a wall. Accused me of murdering your momma. And from the look on her face, she remembers me. Don’t you, Detective?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Vulcan Simmons. You’re Lazarus?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yo guys! It’s her.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It came in from an unknown number, but that’s her badge number. It’s gotta be her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: ‘Addr is 5.’ She was trying to send an address.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Looks like she got cut off.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Run that phone number. Find out who owns it and find out where it is.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: Let’s do without all this Kabuki theater, Detective. It’s undignified. Tell me what I want to know and I’ll give you a proper death without all this messy suffering.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: What was you mission and what do they know about Lazarus?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you want undignified? Then wait ‘til you see what I do to you.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: You know, you’re just like your momma. Both playing in worlds where you don’t belong.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: Your momma paid for it with her life. So will you. But first –

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: Tell me what I want to know!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yo, I just got off with the carrier.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Any idea who’s phone it is?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It’s a pre-paid. There’s no way to identify the owner.

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: I got a hit. The signal originated from a tower in Scarsdale.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Great. Can you lock on the location?

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: No. The message pinged off a single tower. Without a second or third tower there’s no way to narrow it down. Depending on signal strength it could have originated anywhere within this ten mile radius.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It’d be easier to find a needle in a haystack.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Can you ping the GPS?

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: It’s off. And it looks like the phone’s off as well. I’m sorry. I’ve got no other way to trace it. That’s the best I can do.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: You know your lungs are burning. I can feel the panic in your soul. All you want is for this to end. And I promise I will end it. Just tell me what I want to know.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: Scrub the place.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: Find a patch of dirt to put her in, somewhere where she won’t be found.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: I love these woods. My daddy used to take me hunting up here when I was a kid. I spent days learning every rock, every tree. All the secret little places to hide. Over the years it’s come in handy.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: You know, I had to made from the moment you walked through the door. I could see it in your eyes. I thought, no way is this woman a killer. No.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You don’t want to kill me, Harden. You know I’m a cop.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: I’ve killed cops before. In fact, a few of them are your new neighbors.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: My people will hunt you down. They will kill you. But we can make a deal. You help me take down Lazarus you can set any deal you want.

utterance.speaker: HARDEN
utterance.content: Nah, I’m good with the deal I’ve got, thank you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Elena.

utterance.speaker: ELENA
utterance.content: You’ve got balls, I’ll give you that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re not going to kill me?

utterance.speaker: ELENA
utterance.content: He sent me because he owed you. He said he wanted you to live.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who sent you? Who wanted me to live?

utterance.speaker: ELENA
utterance.content: Lazarus.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Tactical teams raided the compound at 0600 this morning, shortly after your call. The place was empty. Everything’s gone.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: The mansion itself is held in trust by an offshore corporation. It’ll be months before we find out who the real owners are.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: If ever.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And what about Vulcan Simmons?

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: My team picked him up this morning in Washington Heights. Nowhere near the compound.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: They’ve been questioning him all morning, but -

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He had an alibi for last night.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: We’ll go after him, but without evidence it’ll be difficult to make any of you allegations stick.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Are you saying we have nothing?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, not nothing.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: Future forward?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, part of the money laundering operation, whatever it was, they are funneling a lot of cash into that account.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: See what happens when I leave you alone?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Babe, I wasn’t alone. When they were interrogating me, the only thing that kept me going was thinking about you. About our future, the wedding. You were with me the whole time.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, at least it’s not a total loss. Now that the police know that Vulcan Simmons is Lazarus they’ll be watching him. He will not be able to rebuild his operation.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He’s not Lazarus. If he was then I would be dead. Vulcan Simmons is just a figurehead. Someone else is behind this. Someone higher up. Someone who wanted me alive.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Who?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Someone bigger.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: This can’t be right.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I’m afraid it is, Sir.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: You’re saying that’s what Future Forward is? A political Super PAC? That’s where the money was going?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah. And that’s the connection to Evan Potter, our would-be victim.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Potter did all the legal work to establish the Super PAC for a client of his, a wealthy hedge fund manager with significant political connections named Jason Kochler.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: It would appear as if drug money were being funneled into Future Forward’s accounts.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Nearly $160 million in the last several months.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: It was then legally laundered, passing through an anonymous shell corp and a second secret Super PAC.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: What do you mean, legally laundered? Where’s that money now?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It’s gone. Federal tax and banking laws regulate these kind of Super PACs, making it impossible for us to find out where that money actually came from or went.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well someone must be able to tell us. Evan Potter?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: No. He just set up the PAC for Kochler. He didn’t run it.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Then we need to bring Jason Kochler in here.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We can’t. He died of a heart attack this morning.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That’s why you couldn’t find the money. Someone’s using it to build a massive political war chest.

utterance.speaker: FOWLER
utterance.content: But who?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It’s impossible to know.

utterance.speaker: SENATOR BRACKEN
utterance.content: Those of you who know me know that I have gotten where I am today by doing whatever it takes to get the job done. That is the kind of leadership the country needs and that is why I am forming an exploratory committee for a run for the presidency of the United States.

utterance.speaker: REPORTER
utterance.content: Senator Bracken, an early frontrunner, is rumored to have significant funding already lined up from major contributors.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hiding behind Vulcan Simmons, funding his campaign with dirty money, killing whoever gets in his way, just like he did with my mom. It’s him. And we have no way of proving it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maybe the Feds will find something.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, Bracken is so well insulated. It’s genius, actually. He has all the campaign funds that he needs without having to compromise or be beholden to any special interest groups.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: But if it really was him, why wouldn’t he just let you die in the woods? Why would he send Elena to save you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Because when I stopped the assassination last year, I saved him. And he told me that he owed me. And now we’re even. So the next time that we see each other …

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Come to bed.
